typeSystemDescription.name: CategoryCoveredTagged
typeSystemDescription.description: Generic "category" type that can be used for e.g. classification results and other categorical data.

typeDescription.name: org.hucompute.textimager.uima.type.category.CategoryCoveredTagged
typeDescription.description: Generic "category" type that can be used for e.g. classification results and other categorical data.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: String-based value, e.g. a topic name like "politics" or "sports".

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: Score, probability or confidence value for the category set in the "value" field.

featureDescription.name: tags
featureDescription.description: Free-form field for tags, has internally often been used to store model name and version.

featureDescription.name: ref
featureDescription.description: This field can reference any other annotation in the CAS, can be used to e.g. directly point to a span in the text to differentiate sentence- and paragraph-based classification results.
